last_episode_to_air.name: Pisces
last_episode_to_air.overview: As Alice considers a big life change, she learns that Davide has made one of his own. Are they a match made in heaven, or will love tear them apart?

name: An Astrological Guide for Broken Hearts
overview: Alice is heartbroken and hopelessly single. But after befriending a charismatic astrology guru, she looks to the stars to find her perfect match.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Alice is heartbroken and hopelessly single. But after befriending a charismatic astrology guru, she looks to the stars to find her perfect match.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: As Alice continues to find steady success with her show, "Stars of Love," her own star-crossed love with Davide proves to be anything but predictable.

episodes.name: Aries
episodes.overview: When her ex gets engaged to another woman, Alice is devastated. Then she meets Tio, a passionate astrologer, and begins looking for love in a new way.

episodes.name: Taurus
episodes.overview: Against the guidance of Tio, Alice goes on a date with an Aries. Later, she crosses paths with a Taurus and takes an enchanting ride through the city.

episodes.name: Gemini
episodes.overview: Alice's fascination with astrology leads to a long-overdue career opportunity. Sparks fly when Alice meets a seductive Gemini on set.

episodes.name: Cancer
episodes.overview: A passionate fling leaves Alice unsatisfied and she has a falling out with Tio. The runaway success of Alice's show comes with lots of complications.

episodes.name: Leo
episodes.overview: While nursing Alice back to health, Tio and Paola compare notes on her love life. Alice has chemistry with a colleague and inquires about his star sign.

episodes.name: Virgo
episodes.overview: On the eve of a big show, Alice navigates strong feelings for two men and consoles Cristina. But will she find love in the stars, or more heartache?

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: Alice is heartbroken and hopelessly single. But after befriending a charismatic astrology guru, she looks to the stars to find her perfect match.

episodes.name: Libra
episodes.overview: After a two-week cooling-off period, Alice and Davide try to navigate working together. But things get awkward when Barbara attends an office party.

episodes.name: Scorpio
episodes.overview: To try and vent her anger at Davide, Alice goes on a paintball date with a charming Scorpio. Meanwhile, Carlo proves to be an annoying houseguest.

episodes.name: Sagittarius
episodes.overview: Using the book Tio gave her, Alice reads her own horoscope for the first time. But the day throws out several curveballs she couldn't see coming.

episodes.name: Capricorn
episodes.overview: In a twist of fate, Alice ends up on a work trip to Paris with Davide. She follows Tio's rules to avoid temptation, but the stars have other plans.

episodes.name: Aquarius
episodes.overview: Paola finds a solution to her pregnancy worries, while Tio gives an interview about his thoughts on everlasting love. Barbara invites Alice to dinner.

episodes.name: Pisces
episodes.overview: As Alice considers a big life change, she learns that Davide has made one of his own. Are they a match made in heaven, or will love tear them apart?

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: As Alice continues to find steady success with her show, "Stars of Love," her own star-crossed love with Davide proves to be anything but predictable.
